title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the BurnoutPreventionSystem. This includes identifying data sources (e.g., employee work hours, project deadlines, workload distribution), defining monitoring metrics (e.g., overtime hours, consecutive working days, task completion rates, stress levels, productivity trends), establishing warning criteria (e.g., thresholds for overtime, workload imbalance, stress levels), specifying recommended actions (e.g., workload redistribution, mandatory time off, counseling, mental health resources recommendations), and outlining the user interface design for the system's interaction with employees and management. Also, consider the potential integration with existing HR or project management systems.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the BurnoutPreventionSystem, including the data pipeline, monitoring components, recommendation engine, user interface, and integration with existing systems (e.g., HR systems, productivity tools). Consider scalability, fault tolerance, security, privacy, and performance requirements. Ensure compliance with relevant regulations and industry standards (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA), and make sure the design is future-proof to accommodate potential changes and updates. The design should also incorporate principles of usability, accessibility, and inclusivity. Provide clear documentation for each component and its integration points.

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Set up the development environment, including version control, continuous integration, and deployment pipelines.

title: Implement Data Ingestion and Processing
description: Develop the components for ingesting and processing employee work data from various sources.

title: Develop Monitoring and Alert System
description: Implement the monitoring system that analyzes work patterns and triggers alerts based on predefined criteria.

title: Build Recommendation Engine
description: Develop the recommendation engine that provides personalized suggestions to prevent burnout based on the monitored data and alerts.

title: Create User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for employees and managers to interact with the BurnoutPreventionSystem.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Ensure the system is secure and has proper access controls in place to protect employee data privacy.

title: Set up Database and Data Storage
description: Design and implement the database and data storage solutions for the BurnoutPreventionSystem.

title: Write Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the BurnoutPreventionSystem.

title: Conduct System Testing
description: Perform thorough testing of the BurnoutPreventionSystem, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.
dependencies: Set up Database and Data Storage

title: Deploy and Monitor System
description: Deploy the BurnoutPreventionSystem to production and set up monitoring and logging systems.
